title: Proposal to burn the maliciously increased KUN by hacker
body:
Discussion and announcement are here: https://forum.qian.finance/t/notice-proposal-to-burn-the-maliciously-increased-kun-by-hacker-voting/258

讨论和公告见此链接：https://forum.qian.finance/t/kun/257

There are two options for this vote: for and against. The decision will be based on the result of the vote whether to destroy the over issued KUN, so that the market data sites and new KUN token holders can get correct information.

本投票有支持和反对两个选项，将根据投票结果决定是否销毁被增发的 KUN，以便行情网站和新的 KUN 持币人能够得到正确的信息。
author: 0xDb80BD4f295623D50c2019581624454d07f070be
